name: Green Dragonborn
description: Dragonborn look very much like dragons standing erect in humanoid form, though they lack wings or a tail. Green dragonborn are cunning and masters of deception, with a connection to poison.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You have a green dragon ancestor, granting you a poisonous breath weapon and resistance to poison.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. It deals poison damage in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + CON mod + prof bonus), taking 2d6 damage on a failed save, and half on a success. This damage increases at higher levels. You can't use this again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to poison damage.
